description: This Kotlin source file defines a demo implementation of the BluetoothPlatform interface for testing Bluetooth connection flows, device scanning, and status updates in an Android app.

classes.name: DemoBluetoothPlatform
classes.description: A demo implementation of BluetoothPlatform interface that simulates Bluetooth device scanning, connecting, and status updates for testing purposes.

methods.name: startScan
methods.description: Starts a simulated Bluetooth device scan, updates the scan results after a delay.

methods.name: stopScan
methods.description: Stops the scanning process, updating the connection state accordingly.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Simulates connecting to a specified device, including a delay and battery level updates.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Simulates disconnecting from the current device.

methods.name: reconnectLast
methods.description: Re-establishes connection to the last device if available.
